1_1Buq4fyG8B3MxAvs7h4bASyWbrKFxmg4CJ.body:
> [matrix](#comment_6_19R2USgb9vPyg1jPQEJkGVoBwDuDcEmHRF): how do I delete it from seeding sites? I clicked on it by mistake :S

Go back to ZeroHello and hover to the site name, there's a three little dots on the right side. Click that, and select delete.
